requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['page_size']=10
params['page']=1
params['kdt_id']=29685507
params['card_no']="3102268490597"
params['buyer_id']=690874028
params['biz_type']="ALL"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.cardvoucher.card.bill.query', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'10', 'page' => '1', 'kdt_id' => '29685507', 'card_no' => '3102268490597', 'buyer_id' => '690874028', 'biz_type' => 'ALL', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';
